content: this legal text summarizes the division of property between two individuals referred to as cg and cm the property includes a rural building and land in a specific municipality the parties agree to terminate their coownership and divide the assets into two shares with each party being assigned a specific share the value of each share is specified and the properties are transferred with all related accessories and dependencies the parties also mutually guarantee ownership and waive any potential legal mortgage the expenses of the division will be shared equally between the parties the document is signed by the parties and a notary
